title: To-Get-Her
description: Hadley Simon considers herself an ugly duckling. She has always been told how beautiful her sisters are and the boys have never responded to her. She has resigned herself to living alone, anxiety and all. Enjoying her time with books and work, she doesn't see Troy Hills coming. Troy is beautiful and athletic. Hadley doesn't trust that his attraction is real, but she is falling fast. Can she see passed her insecurities and let him in or is this a big set up after all?
author: Laura Barck
